system.effect: Can be fired when the enemy is not seen with help of a spotter. Attack always requires Full Action with -10 to Test. If Successful test, scatter 1d10-BS Metres, Missed shots scatter Xd10 metres. A Comrade may assist in firing, removing -10 penalty and missed hits instead scattering Xd5 metres.
